short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes it easy for you to add links in Rinkoe Collection and has Twitter/X support.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your online experience with the Rinkoe Magic extension! This handy tool simplifies certain tasks, link management, accessible from anywhere. Effortlessly manage your Rinkoe.com collections, making it easier than ever to organize and access your saved items.

Key Features:

1. Add Link: Right-click on any link and effortlessly add it to your Rinkoe.com collection. Keep track of important URLs with ease.

2. Add Image Link: Capture image URLs directly by right-clicking on an image. Perfect for saving and organizing visual content seamlessly.

3. Add This Page: Quickly save the current page to your Rinkoe.com collection. A one-click solution to the content you love.

4. Add Custom Item: Input any link and add it directly to your Rinkoe.com collection. Ideal for manually saving specific URLs that matter to you.

Note: A Rinkoe.com Account is Required

o unlock the full potential of the Rinkoe Magic extension, sign in or create a Rinkoe.com account. Enjoy the benefits of centralized link management, accessible from anywhere. Effortlessly manage your Rinkoe.com collections, making it easier than ever to organize and access your saved items.

Getting Started:
1. Install the Rinkoe Helper extension.
2. Right-click on links, images, or the page to utilize the convenient context menu options.
3. Sign in to your Rinkoe.com account or create a new one to seamlessly sync your saved items.

Pro Tip: Pin to Toolbar for Easy Access

For quick access to Rinkoe Helper, we recommend pinning the extension to your browser's toolbar. This ensures easy access to the powerful features whenever you need them.

Optimize your online activities and stay organized with Rinkoe Helper. Download now and experience a smarter way to manage your links!
